entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:26 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
